pr_title: SAK-43760 Rubrics: Can not use keyboard-only to edit criterion or rating

timeline.bodyText: Can you stick to the formatting in the rest of the file? Space before the opening brace and a blank line to start the function body, unless the function is only one line of code.
timeline.author: adrianfish

timeline.bodyText: Did you mean to check two codes here? And, could you leave a space after the if, and one before the opening brace?
timeline.author: adrianfish

timeline.bodyText: Could you take this blank line out?
timeline.author: adrianfish

timeline.bodyText: Could you format this function in line with the rest of the file? And, I think you meant to test two different codes here.
timeline.author: adrianfish

timeline.bodyText: Please format this like the rest of the file. And, you're checking for 32 twice.
timeline.author: adrianfish

timeline.bodyText: Can you format this like the rest of the file, please? Also, you're checking for the same keycode twice.
timeline.author: adrianfish
adrianfish

timeline.bodyText: Why bother with a const for a string you're only going to use once? Just use the string.
timeline.author: adrianfish

timeline.bodyText: Same with all these variables. You don't need them.
timeline.author: adrianfish
